content: I'm wondering what is the process to register a CodeSystem URI with HL7 FHIR. We would like to register an URI for Health Canada Drug Identification Number. Its OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1105, symbolic name: hc-DIN. It would be beneficial to have this URI registered as it will be used by many implementations in Canada. I'm also wondering whether the URI should be http://www.hc-sc.gc.ca/hc-din or http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/hc-din
that's a decision for Canadians to make - you should discuss this on the canadian stream
I will do. When there is a decision on the URI, how can we register this URI at http://hl7.org/fhir/terminologies-systems.html?
well, then you can create a task. But other countries are maintaining their own registries rather than adding to that page.
